comment: She was incredibly accommodative of me being online only and unable to do aspects like the student teaching due to deferring some classes. She gives a lot of work, but it has substance and does not feel like busy work. Very quick to grade and respond to emails, and she gave great feedback.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: Avoid it if you can. Takes this class way too seriously. Her class is a part-time job. All the assignments are meaningless. I learned nothing except how to give my whole weekend to completing her busy work assignments.

This class has a lot of assignments. It can be difficult to keep up with all the work, however, Dr. Everett was very understanding about this. As long as you finish every assignment and pace yourself well, you will do just fine in the class.

This class was not easy, especially online. You had to work for it. However, her rubrics were very clear and drew exactly what was expected. She was super nice, although we never met her personally because it was asynchronous. You can get an A, I was extremely busy and managed to get an A.

This class is difficult, but is not the professors fault. My only complaint is that it was extremely difficult to get Dr. Everett to respond to emails, and when she did she was always rude and confused as to why we had questions. Not a bad choice for a professor, but it wouldn't be my first.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Tough grader

comment: Loved this class, loved this professor. Super knowledgeable and extremely understanding and willing to work with students. Would absolutely recommend her to anyone!

Literally the rudest and most condescending professor I've ever had. How is her score not lower on here?? If you ask her a question about something, she gets annoyed and wonders why. Has no motive to build any kind of relationship with any of her students. I made an A in her class because I kept up with the workload, but she as a person? UGH.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: The online format of this class is TOUGH, but that's not her fault. My only complaint about this professor and not the class is that she grades the lesson plan parts on C&W first and transfers that grade to D2L which made us get like 75 on some stuff. Tough grader on things like the lesson plan parts and observation report, but thats it.

She's a very nice and knowledgeable person. I would not suggest taking her for online classes. She's an easy grader until it gets to the lesson plan and she gets very picky and the feedback is all over the place. She's very reachable though email and text. She's not terrible but the online format of this class is tough sometimes.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Tough grader

comment: Dr. Everett is very knowledgeable, but this class is very lecture based and boring. She also is all over the place with grading and assignment instructions and often had to be told about missing grades. The assignments are not hard so its still easy to get an A with work, but just expect a lot of confusion and having to email her for clarification
